items.title: BioNTech, Pfizer to start testing universal vaccine for coronaviruses
items.content_html:
yomoyomo@yomoyomo BioNTech, Pfizer to start testing universal vaccine for coronaviruses

BioNTech, Pfizer to starting testing universal coronavirus vaccine in H2

Germany's BioNTech , Pfizer's partner in COVID-19 vaccines, said the two companies would start tests on humans of next-generation shots that protect against a wide variety of coronaviruses in the second half of the year.

Article URL: https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/biontech-pfizer-starting-testing-universal-coronavirus-vaccine-h2-2022-06-29/

items.title: Google patches new Chrome zero-day flaw exploited in attacks
items.content_html:
piyokango@piyokango Google patches new Chrome zero-day flaw exploited in attacks

Google patches new Chrome zero-day flaw exploited in attacks

Google has released Chrome 103.0.5060.114 for Windows users to address a high-severity zero-day vulnerability exploited by attackers in the wild, the fourth Chrome zero-day patched in 2022.

Article URL: https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/google-patches-new-chrome-zero-day-flaw-exploited-in-attacks/
